# VoicemailInfo

Specifies whether to take a voicemail and who should do it

**Properties**

| Name      | Type          | Required | Description                                          |
| :-------- | :------------ | :------- | :--------------------------------------------------- |
| enabled   | bool          | ❌       | If `true` then voicemails are allowed to be received |
| recipient | RecipientInfo | ❌       | Recipient data                                       |
